name: REFLECTORY 镜与光
description:
REFLECTORY® 镜与光 pls read the rules before playing the game 请先阅读规则 Rules

AD to Move

W to jump 

esc  to pause the game

You can click on any unlocked blocks

Different block settings for each level

Clicking on an unlocked block will bring up a pop-up window

Click on the top of the window to drag and move it

Right click on the window or click the x button to close it

There are two types of ray receivers: instant and progress

let  ray to point on a ray receiver that's connected to the exit will unlock the exit

pass that the exit means completing the level

Each ray emitter has a different reflection limit

The number of reflections will be indicated by the thickness of the ray

规则

AD键 左右移动

W或空格键 跳跃

esc键 暂停游戏

可点击任何未锁定的方块

每一关的方块锁定设置不同

点击未锁定的方块会弹出窗口

窗口的上方点击后可拖动

右键窗口或点击x键即可关闭

接收器有即时和充能两种

用射线照射连通出口的接收器

即可过门通关

每个发射器的反射限制有所不同

反射次数将会在射线的粗度上提示
